ownerships.owner: Trump International Hotels Management LLC (D/B/A Trump Hotel Collection [Hawaii], Trump Hotel Collection [New York])

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of THC IMEA Development LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned None (or less than $201) in  income from THC IMEA DEVELOPMENT LLC, valued at $15,001 - $50,000. Value reported reflects bank account holding only. Additional Underlying Asset: developer - value not readily ascertainable. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
